mapper.insert: insert into account (account_no, account_name, account_type, status, balance, create_time, currency) values (#{accountNo}, #{accountName}, #{accountType}, #{status}, #{balance}, now(), #{currency})
mapper.select: select * from account where account_no = #{accountNo} for update NOWAIT
mapper.update: update account set status=#{status}, update_time=NOW() where account_no = #{accountNo};
update account set balance=#{balance}, prev_balance=#{prevBalance}, prev_trans_date=now(), update_time=now() where account_no = #{accountNo};
